response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We understand its worth to you might be $10,000, but we hope you'll consider the unique benefits and quality that come with our product, making this offer a great opportunity for you.
